effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.sun-moon: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
